problem_names: lemma [simp]: "(typeof v = Some Boolean) = (\<exists>b. v = Bool b)"
lemma [simp]: "(typeof v = Some Integer) = (\<exists>i. v = Intg i)"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. default_val T = Ref (a, Cs) \<Longrightarrow> False

primrec typeof :: "val \<Rightarrow> ty option" where
  "typeof Unit     = Some Void"
| "typeof Null     = Some NT"
| "typeof (Bool b) = Some Boolean"
| "typeof (Intg i) = Some Integer"
| "typeof (Ref r)  = None"
lemma [simp]: "(typeof v = Some Boolean) = (\<exists>b. v = Bool b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (typeof v = \<lfloor>Boolean\<rfloor>) = (\<exists>b. v = Bool b)
lemma [simp]: "(typeof v = Some Integer) = (\<exists>i. v = Intg i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (typeof v = \<lfloor>Integer\<rfloor>) = (\<exists>i. v = Intg i)
